attributes.action: Nathro Hill Wind Farm, Careston Estate, Angus
attributes.additional_details:
Please say no to this monstrous development of 17 huge wind turbines in one of Scotlands last unspoilt and sacred Glens.

Can you accept responsibility for allowing such wholesale destruction to be wrecked on our beautful landscape by this and the many other windfarms popping up indiscriminately, or do you have the courage to stand up and say NO, enough is enough?

Let's think smarter, invest in our best Scottish minds and find another way.
